name: 21Moves: Cube Scanner & Solver
description:
Just two easy steps! First, our scanner will capture the state of your cube using your camera. Then, we’ll show you the most efficient way to solve your cube. All you have to do is follow our easy steps! After trying a few times, you’ll definitely get the hang of it!

We are built upon user feedback so if there is something you’d like to tell us, please let us know within the app! We will read every single one. Thank you for supporting our small team by letting us know how we can improve.

Disclaimer: All company names (Rubik’s Brand Ltd) are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them.
